page.title: 03LIFE STYLES IN THE SEND AREA
page.content: The Middle School in Send serves a large catchment area and children of 8 years and over are brought from neighbouring villages of Ripley, Wisley and West Clandon, direct distances of up to 6km. Of the 230 children on roll, 14% travelled by coach, 17% cycled, 27% walked and 42% were brought by car. Childrens homes without cars totalled 6%, 35% had 1 car, 49% had 2 cars, 7% had 3 cars and 3% had 4 cars. 4% had no telephones 54% had 1 32% had 2, 7% had 3, 1% had 4 and 2% had 5 phone outlets. Working T.V sets per home included 0.5% with none, 18% with 1, 47% with 2, 26% with 3,7% with 4 and 1% with 5 and 0.5% with 7. 51% of homes had mini computers available for childrens use.
